title: Monday.com Pricing Plans: A Comprehensive Guide
content: Monday.com offers a tiered pricing structure, including a Free plan for up to 2 users with limited features, suitable for individuals or very small teams. Paid plans generally require a minimum of 3 users and are billed annually for lower rates. The Basic Plan starts at $9 per user per month, offering unlimited boards, items, and docs, 5 GB storage, and 24/7 customer support. The Standard Plan, starting at $12 per user per month, adds features like Timeline and Gantt views, calendar view, guest access, and 250 automations and integrations per month. The Pro Plan, at $19 per user per month, includes time tracking, private boards, and advanced integrations. The Enterprise Plan requires contacting sales for custom pricing and is designed for larger organizations needing advanced features, security, and tailored onboarding. Monday.com also offers a 14-day free trial for its Pro plan, and monday CRM has separate pricing.
